original: zhes pa ni gzhan yang bde ba chen po'i 'jig rten gyi tshul rtsa ba'i rigs dang ldan pa bstan te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni gzhan yang bde ba chen po'i 'jig rten gyi tshul rtsa ba'i rigs dang ldan pa bstan te /
translated: This is the teaching of the way of the world of great bliss, endowed with the root lineage.

original: de yang gzhung rgyas pa ma yin gyi //
analyzed: de yang gzhung rgyas pa ma yin gyi //
translated: Moreover, this is not an extensive text.

original: gzhung bsdus pa yin la /
analyzed: gzhung bsdus pa yin la /
translated: It is a concise text.

original: don rgyas pa zhes pa'am /
analyzed: don rgyas pa zhes pa'am /
translated: It is said to be extensive in meaning.

original: yang na rgyas pa ni dbang gi le'u las bstan te /
analyzed: yang na rgyas pa ni dbang gi le'u las bstan te /
translated: Or, the extensive [teaching] is taught in the chapter on empowerment.

original: de bas na bsdus pa'i tshul gyis bstan zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: de bas na bsdus pa'i tshul gyis bstan zhes dgongs so //
translated: Therefore, it is intended to be taught in a concise manner.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi le'u la sogs pa las /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi le'u la sogs pa las /
translated: In the chapter on the world system and so forth,

original: le'u lnga ba mchog tu mi 'gyur pa'i dbang gi sgrub pa'i mdor bsdus pa'i le'u zhes pa ni /
analyzed: le'u lnga ba mchog tu mi 'gyur pa'i dbang gi sgrub pa'i mdor bsdus pa'i le'u zhes pa ni /
translated: the fifth chapter is called The Concise Chapter on the Attainment of the Supreme Unchanging Empowerment.

original: skyob pa'am / g-yogs pas le'u zhes bya'o //
analyzed: skyob pa'am / g-yogs pas le'u zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called a chapter because it protects or covers.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: mkhas min blo ni dri mas g-yogs //
analyzed: mkhas min blo ni dri mas g-yogs //
translated: The unwise, their minds obscured by stains,

original: gzhung don log par ston par byed //
analyzed: gzhung don log par ston par byed //
translated: teach the meaning of the text in a distorted way.

original: bdag gis rtsa rgyud sogs bltas nas //
analyzed: bdag gis rtsa rgyud sogs bltas nas //
translated: Having examined the root tantra and so forth,

original: brtse bas 'grel pa bris pa yin //
analyzed: brtse bas 'grel pa bris pa yin //
translated: I have written this commentary out of love.

original: dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyud chen gyi //
analyzed: dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyud chen gyi //
translated: In the great tantra of the primordial buddha,

original: mdor bsdus dbang gi 'grel byas pa'i //
analyzed: mdor bsdus dbang gi 'grel byas pa'i //
translated: The virtue I have accumulated by composing

original: dge ba bdag gis bsags pa 'dis //
analyzed: dge ba bdag gis bsags pa 'dis //
translated: this commentary on the concise empowerment

original: 'gro ba 'gyur med dbang thob shog / dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud las bkol ba /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'gyur med dbang thob shog / dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud las bkol ba /
translated: may all beings attain the unchanging empowerment.

original: dbang mdor bstan pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa /
analyzed: dbang mdor bstan pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa /
translated: The commentary on the concise explanation of empowermentüîΩtaken from the tantra of the primordial buddha,

original: rnal 'byor pa dus kyi 'khor lo'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa dus kyi 'khor lo'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: composed by the yogi Kalacakrapada, is complete.

original: // / kha che'i pandi ta zla ba'i mgon po dang / lo ts'a ba 'bro dge slong shes rab grags kyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / kha che'i pandi ta zla ba'i mgon po dang / lo ts'a ba 'bro dge slong shes rab grags kyis bsgyur ba'o//
translated: Translated by the Kashmiri pa·πá·∏çita Candragomin and the Tibetan translator Blo gros dbang phyug.
